summary: Life of a 14 year old girl Nam, who falls in love with her senior of tenth grade P'Shone and tries desperately to win his attention.
cast: Pimchanok Leuwisetpaiboon|Mario Maurer|Tangi Namonto|Yanika Thongprayoon|Acharanat Ariyaritwikol|Peerawat Herabat|Front Montgomery|Khachamach Promsaka Na Skolnakorn|Pijittra Siriwetchapan
director: Directors: Puttipong Pormsaka Na-Sakonnakorn, Wasin Pokpong
title: Sing lek lek tee reak wa rak
